app.name: Survey
app.description: An app which asks the user to fill out some questions.

messageIds.introText:
# Appsemble survey
This app is a template app used to demo how a survey app could be created using [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app).
messageIds.triedAppsemble: Have you tried building an app in appsemble yet?
messageIds.consideringAppsemble: Are you considering Appsemble for your next app in the next 6 months?
messageIds.buildYourself: Do you intend to build an app yourself or let someone else build it?
messageIds.featureImportance: Can you order the following properties of high to low importance to you?
messageIds.propertyImportance: Can you order the following properties of high to low importance to you?
messageIds.finished: Thank you for taking our survey. You can try [Appsemble](https://appsemble.app) yourself to create your own app. This app can be cloned from [our store page](https://appsemble.app/apps/{appId}).
